title: Authorizes Greenwood Lake to retain financial responsibility for state aid for students receiving educational services from Tuxedo Union Free school district
summary: Authorizes Greenwood Lake Union Free school district to retain financial responsibility for state aid for students receiving certain educational services from Tuxedo Union Free school district.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2238

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 14, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. RABBITT -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Education

       AN ACT to authorize Greenwood Lake Union Free school  district  to  file
         for  aid  on  behalf of certain students receiving certain educational
         services from Tuxedo Union Free school district

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Notwithstanding any other provision of law to the contrary,
    2  for  the 2011--2012 school year and thereafter, the Greenwood Lake union
    3  free school district, in any year in which it  maintains  an  elementary
    4  school  and  does  not operate a kindergarten through twelve program and
    5  contracts for education of all of its secondary  pupils  in  the  Tuxedo
    6  union  free  school  district, may elect to receive any aids apportioned
    7  pursuant to, or in lieu of, sections 701, 711,  751,  753,  1104,  1950,
    8  3602,  3602-b,  3602-c,  3602-e,  3612 and 4405 of the education law for
    9  such secondary pupils as if they were enrolled at, and in attendance  at
   10  the  Greenwood  Lake  union  free school district, the Tuxedo union free
   11  school district shall not be eligible for aid apportioned  pursuant  to,
   12  or  in  lieu  of, sections 701, 711, 751, 753, 1104, 1950, 3602, 3602-b,
   13  3602-c, 3602-e, 3612 and 4405 of the education law  for  such  secondary
   14  pupils,  and  shall  not  include such aid in calculation of the tuition
   15  charge payable by the Greenwood Lake union free school district for such
   16  secondary pupils.
   17    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03526-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to authorize Greenwood Lake Union Free school district to file for aid on behalf of certain students receiving certain educational services from Tuxedo Union Free school district
